testsuite.name: MealPlannerTests

testcase.name: start

failure.message:
java.lang.AssertionError: Wrong answer in test #5
Make sure that formatting of your output is similar to the one in the example. Also, your output should contain the meals in alphabetic order.
Please find below the output of your program during this failed test. Note that the '>' character indicates the beginning of the input line.
---
What would you like to do (add, show, plan, save, exit)? > add Which meal do you want to add (breakfast, lunch, dinner)? > breakfast Input the meal's name: > scrambled eggs Input the ingredients: > eggs,milk,cheese The meal has been added! What would you like to do (add, show, plan, save, exit)? > add Which meal do you want to add (breakfast, lunch, dinner)? > breakfast Input the meal's name: > sandwich Input the ingredients: > bread,cheese,ham The meal has been added! What would you like to do (add, show, plan, save, exit)? > add Which meal do you want to add (breakfast, lunch, dinner)? > breakfast Input the meal's name: > oatmeal Input the ingredients: > oats,milk,banana,peanut butter The meal has been added! What would you like to do (add, show, plan, save, exit)? > add Which meal do you want to add (breakfast, lunch, dinner)? > breakfast Input the meal's name: > english breakfast Input the ingredients: > eggs,sausages,bacon,tomatoes,bread The meal has been added! What would you like to do (add, show, plan, save, exit)? > add Which meal do you want to add (breakfast, lunch, dinner)? > lunch Input the meal's name: > sushi Input the ingredients: > salmon,rice,avocado The meal has been added! What would you like to do (add, show, plan, save, exit)? > add Which meal do you want to add (breakfast, lunch, dinner)? > lunch Input the meal's name: > chicken salad Input the ingredients: > chicken,lettuce,tomato,olives The meal has been added! What would you like to do (add, show, plan, save, exit)? > add Which meal do you want to add (breakfast, lunch, dinner)? > lunch Input the meal's name: > omelette Input the ingredients: > eggs,milk,cheese The meal has been added! What would you like to do (add, show, plan, save, exit)? > add Which meal do you want to add (breakfast, lunch, dinner)? > lunch Input the meal's name: > salad Input the ingredients: > lettuce,tomato,onion,cheese,olives The meal has been added! What would you like to do (add, show, plan, save, exit)? > add Which meal do you want to add (breakfast, lunch, dinner)? > dinner Input the meal's name: > pumpkin soup Input the ingredients: > pumpkin,coconut milk,curry,carrots The meal has been added! What would you like to do (add, show, plan, save, exit)? > add Which meal do you want to add (breakfast, lunch, dinner)? > dinner Input the meal's name: > beef steak Input the ingredients: > beef steak The meal has been added! What would you like to do (add, show, plan, save, exit)? > add Which meal do you want to add (breakfast, lunch, dinner)? > dinner Input the meal's name: > pizza Input the ingredients: > flour,tomato,cheese,salami The meal has been added! What would you like to do (add, show, plan, save, exit)? > add Which meal do you want to add (breakfast, lunch, dinner)? > dinner Input the meal's name: > tomato soup Input the ingredients: > tomato,orzo The meal has been added! What would you like to do (add, show, plan, save, exit)? > plan Monday scrambled eggs sandwich oatmeal english breakfast Choose the breakfast for Monday from the list above:
